sentences.en: Death is a cruel, brutal, and fearsome trespasser into this world.
sentences.cn: 死亡是降临到这个世界上的一个残忍的、无情的、可怕的侵入者。

sentences.en: Everson began filming after Christopher fired the first shot, the one that felled the man Meredith Vieira described as a “trespasser.
sentences.cn: 克里斯托弗开枪后艾弗森才开始拍摄，梅雷迪斯•维埃拉将被击倒的人称为“非法入侵者”。

sentences.en: Finally, Jack's owner, Donna Dickey, called the cat inside, and the timorous trespasser disappeared back into the woods.
sentences.cn: 最后，杰克的主人唐娜迪克唤回了杰克猫，那只胆怯的入侵者才回头消失在了树林里。

sentences.en: He set the dogs on the trespasser.
In such event the offending member or guest shall be trespasser.
sentences.cn: 在此情况下,违例的会员或嘉宾一概视作擅自进入论.

sentences.en: In such event the offending member or guest shall then trespasser.
sentences.cn: 在此情况下,违例的会员或嘉宾概视作擅自进入论.

sentences.en: This trespasser was the source ; no doubt of that.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,这气味就是从这个 不速之客 身上传来的.

words.tran_cn: 罪过；非法侵入；过失；擅自进入
